caption.title: Table of past outbreaks by year and country.
caption.p: Official reported case counts for each epidemic are given, including suspected cases (“Reported Count”). Case counts for the time series data included in the models include only probable and confirmed cases (“Time Series Count”). Case counts for historic outbreaks were pulled from publicly available literature [ 17– 30]. Lastly, each historic outbreak’s inclusion in the regression, stochastic, and auto-regression models is enumerated.
Click here for additional data file.
